title: Exchange ActiveSync (com.apple.eas.account)
description: The payload that configures Exchange ActiveSync accounts.

UserName.title: User
UserName.description: This user name for this Exchange account. Required for noninteractive installations like MDM in iOS.

EmailAddress.title: Email Address
EmailAddress.description: The full email address for the account. If not present in the payload, the device prompts for this string during profile installation.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: The password of the account. Use only with encrypted profiles.

OverridePreviousPassword.title: Override previous password
OverridePreviousPassword.description: If 'true', the system overrides the previous user/EAS password with the new EAS password in the payload. Available in iOS 14 and later.

Host.title: Exchange ActiveSync Host
Host.description: The Exchange server host name or IP address.

SSL.title: Use SSL
SSL.description: If 'true', the system enables SSL for authentication.

OAuth.title: Use OAuth
OAuth.description:
If 'true', enables OAuth for authentication. If enabled, don't specify a password.

Available only in iOS 12.0 and above.

CertificateName.title: Authentication Credential Name
CertificateName.description: The name or description of the certificate.

CertificatePassword.title: Authentication Credential Password
CertificatePassword.description: The password necessary for the '.p12' identity certificate. Used with mandatory encryption of profiles.

PreventMove.title: Prevent Move
PreventMove.description: If 'true', the system prevents moving messages from out of this email account into another account. This setting also prevents forwarding or replying from an account other than the recipient of the message.

PreventAppSheet.title: Prevent App Sheet
PreventAppSheet.description: If 'true', prevents this account from sending mail in any app other than the Apple Mail app.

PayloadCertificateUUID.title: Payload Certificate UUID
PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate payload within the same profile to use for the identity credential. If this field is present, the Certificate field isn't used.

SMIMEEnabled.title: S/MIME Enabled
SMIMEEnabled.description: If 'true', the system enables S/MIME encryption. In iOS 10.0 and later, this key is ignored. Use 'SMIMESigningEnabled' instead.

SMIMESigningEnabled.title: S/MIME Signing Enabled
SMIMESigningEnabled.description: If 'true', the system enables S/MIME signing for this account. Available in iOS 10.0 and later.

SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Signing Certificate
SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the identity certificate used to sign messages sent from this account.

SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.title: S/MIME Encryption Enabled
SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.description: If 'true', the system enables S/MIME encryption for this account. Available in iOS 10.0 and later. As of iOS 12.0, this key is deprecated. Use 'SMIMEEncryptByDefault' instead.

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Encryption Certificate
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.description: The payload UUID of the identity certificate used to decrypt messages sent to this account. The system attaches the public certificate to outgoing mail to allow the user to receive encrypted mail. When the user sends encrypted mail, the system uses the public certificate to encrypt the copy of the mail in the user's Sent mailbox.

SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.title: S/MIME Enable Per-Message Switch
SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.description:
If 'true', the system displays the per-message encryption switch in the Mail Compose UI.

Available in iOS 8.0 and later. As of iOS 12.0, this key is deprecated. Use 'SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch' instead.

SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.title: Allow user to toggle S/MIME Signing
SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.description: If 'true', the user can turn S/MIME signing on or off in Settings. Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Identity
SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.description: If 'true', the user can select the signing identity. Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

SMIMEEncryptByDefault.title: Enable S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptByDefault.description: If 'true', the system enables S/MIME encryption by default. If 'SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch' is 'false', the user can't change this default. Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.description: If 'true', the system enables encryption by default and the user can't change it. Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption Certificate
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.description: If 'true', the user can select the S/MIME encryption identity, and encryption is on.Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption per message
SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.description: If 'true', the system displays the per-message encryption switch in the Mail Compose UI. Available in iOS 12.0 and later.

EnableCalendars.title: Enabled Services - Calendars
EnableCalendars.description:
If 'false', the system disables the Calendars service for this account. The user can reenable Calendars service in Settings unless 'EnableCalendarsUserOverridable' is 'false'.

Note:
At least of the following fields needs to be 'true': 'EnableMail', 'EnableContacts', 'EnableCalendars', 'EnableReminders', and 'EnableNotes'.

EnableContacts.title: Enabled Services - Contacts
EnableContacts.description:
If 'false', the system disables the Contacts service for this account. The user can reenable Contacts service in Settings unless 'EnableContactsUserOverridable' is 'false'.

Note:
At least of the following fields needs to be 'true': 'EnableMail', 'EnableContacts', 'EnableCalendars', 'EnableReminders', and 'EnableNotes'.

EnableMail.title: Enabled Services - Mail
EnableMail.description:
If 'false', the system disables the Mail service for this account. The user can reenable Mail service in Settings unless 'EnableMailUserOverridable' is 'false'.

Note:
At least of the following fields needs to be 'true': 'EnableMail', 'EnableContacts', 'EnableCalendars', 'EnableReminders', and 'EnableNotes'.

EnableNotes.title: Enabled Services - Notes
EnableNotes.description:
If 'false', the system disables the Notes service for this account. The user can reenable Notes service in Settings unless 'EnableNotesUserOverridable' is 'false'.

Note:
At least of the following fields needs to be 'true': 'EnableMail', 'EnableContacts', 'EnableCalendars', 'EnableReminders', and 'EnableNotes'.

EnableReminders.title: Enabled Services - Reminders
EnableReminders.description:
If 'false', the system disables the Reminders service for this account. The user can reenable Reminders service in Settings unless 'EnableRemindersUserOverridable' is 'false'.

Note:
At least of the following fields needs to be 'true': 'EnableMail', 'EnableContacts', 'EnableCalendars', 'EnableReminders', and 'EnableNotes'.

EnableCalendarsUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Calendars
EnableCalendarsUserOverridable.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from changing the state of the Calendars service for this account in Settings.

EnableContactsUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Contacts
EnableContactsUserOverridable.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from changing the state of the Contacts service for this account in Settings.

EnableMailUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Mail
EnableMailUserOverridable.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from changing the state of the Mail service for this account in Settings.

EnableNotesUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Notes
EnableNotesUserOverridable.description: If 'false', prevents the user from changing the state of the Notes service for this account in Settings.

EnableRemindersUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Reminders
EnableRemindersUserOverridable.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from changing the state of the Reminders service for this account in Settings.

disableMailRecentsSyncing.title: Disable Mail Recents Syncing
disableMailRecentsSyncing.description: If 'true', the system excludes this account from Recent Addresses syncing.

MailNumberOfPastDaysToSync.title: Past Days of Mail to Sync
MailNumberOfPastDaysToSync.description:
The number of days in the past to sync mail on the device.

For no limit, use the value '0'.

CommunicationServiceRules.title: Communication Service Rules
CommunicationServiceRules.description: The communication service handler rules for this account.

DefaultServiceHandlers.title: Default Service Handlers
DefaultServiceHandlers.description: The default handlers to use for contacts from this account.

AudioCall.title: App for audio calls
AudioCall.description: The bundle identifier of the default application to use for audio calls made to contacts from this account.

VPNUUID.title: VPNUUID
VPNUUID.description: The VPNUUID of the per-app VPN the account uses for network communication. Available in iOS 14 and later.

HeaderMagic.description: The value of the 'X-Apple-Config-Magic' header in each EAS HTTP request.

allowMailDrop.title: Allow Mail Drop
allowMailDrop.description: If 'true', the system enables this account to use Mail Drop.

OAuthSignInURL.description: The URL that this account should use for signing in through OAuth. Ignored unless 'OAuth' is 'true'. If you specify this URL, auto-discovery isn't used for this account, so you need to also specify a host.

OAuthTokenRequestURL.description: The URL that this account should use for token requests through OAuth. Ignored unless 'OAuth' is 'true'.
